# Digital Clock using JavaScript

This project showcases a digital clock designed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The clock displays the current time with hours, minutes, and seconds.

## Project Completion Date

This project was completed on December 17, 2022.

## Usage

To view the digital clock:
1. Clone the repository or download the HTML and CSS files.
2. Open the `index.html` file in a web browser.
3. The clock will automatically display the current time and update every second.

## Features

- Displays the current time with hours, minutes, and seconds.
- Stylish and modern design with colorful backgrounds and stylish font.
- Utilizes JavaScript's Date object to get the current time and update the clock dynamically.
- Responsive design for various screen sizes.

## File Structure

- `index.html`: HTML file containing the structure of the digital clock and inline JavaScript which includes the logic to update the clock with the current time.
- `style.css`: CSS file containing styles for the digital clock interface.
